Operating System Support: Windows  OS X  Unix-like  Morph OS
Description: Has a built-in tracker and announcement service

IPv6: (IPv4 and IPv6 have separate binaries and processes that do not share any information between them. If a client communicates to the tracker over IPv6  it will only receive IPv6 addresses in the response.)
Description: Uses libowfat <ref></ref> performs well even on embedded hardware. Only requirement is a POSIX compliant OS. Supports only a compact peer list.
Extremely lightweight and efficient BitTorrent tracker. Supports SQLite3  and MySQL for storage.
Does not have a list of hosted torrents.
Lightweight. Supports DHT  PEX  announcements via UDP. Does not have a web interface or list of hosted torrents; it is not designed for secure or large-scale application.
Vuze (formerly Azureus) has a built in tracker.
Uses MySQL for data storage  lightweight tracker
